trans-unit.source: Provides client connections for TCP network services.
trans-unit.target: 提供 TCP 網路服務的用戶端連接。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> class provides simple methods for connecting, sending, and receiving stream data over a network in synchronous blocking mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>類別會提供簡單的方法來連接，傳送和接收串流資料在同步模式中封鎖在網路上。

trans-unit.source: In order for <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> to connect and exchange data, a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> created with the TCP <xref:System.Net.Sockets.ProtocolType> must be listening for incoming connection requests.
trans-unit.target: 為了讓<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>連接，並交換資料，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>建立 TCP<xref:System.Net.Sockets.ProtocolType>必須接聽內送連接要求。

trans-unit.source: You can connect to this listener in one of the following two ways:
trans-unit.target: 您可以連接至此接聽程式，在下列兩種方式之一：

trans-unit.source: Create a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> and call one of the three available <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Connect%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>並呼叫其中一個可用的三個<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Connect%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Create a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> using the host name and port number of the remote host.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>使用主機名稱和連接埠號碼遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: This constructor will automatically attempt a connection.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式將會自動嘗試連線。

trans-unit.source: If you want to send connectionless datagrams in synchronous blocking mode, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要將無連接的資料包傳送同步封鎖模式中，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following code example establishes a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> connection.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>連線。

trans-unit.source: Permission to establish an outgoing connection or accept an incoming request.
trans-unit.target: 建立傳出連線，或接受連入要求的權限。

trans-unit.source: To send and receive data, use the <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.GetStream" /> method to obtain a <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要傳送和接收資料，使用<see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.GetStream" />方法，以取得<see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream" />。

trans-unit.source: Call the <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)" /> and <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)" /> methods of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream" /> to send and receive data with the remote host.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)" />和<see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)" />方法<see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream" />來傳送和接收資料的遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: Use the <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Close(System.Int32)" /> method to release all resources associated with the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用<see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Close(System.Int32)" />方法釋放相關聯的所有資源<see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a new <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> and allows the underlying service provider to assign the most appropriate local IP address and port number.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立新<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>並允許基礎的服務提供者指派最適當的本機 IP 位址和通訊埠編號。

trans-unit.source: You must first call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Connect%2A> method before sending and receiving data.
trans-unit.target: 您必須先呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Connect%2A>方法，再傳送和接收資料。

trans-unit.source: This constructor works only with IPv4 address types.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式只適用於 IPv4 位址類型。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the default constructor to create a new <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用預設建構函式來建立新的<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.IPEndPoint" /> to which you bind the TCP <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />.
trans-unit.target: 您要繫結 TCP <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Net.IPEndPoint" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient" /> class and binds it to the specified local endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient" /> 類別的新執行個體，並將它繫結至指定的本機端點。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a new <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> and binds it to the <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> specified by the `localEP` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立新<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>和繫結至<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>所指定`localEP`參數。

trans-unit.source: Before you call this constructor, you must create an <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> using the IP address and port number from which you intend to send and receive data.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫這個建構函式之前，您必須建立<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>使用您想要傳送和接收資料的 IP 位址和連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to specify a local IP address and port number before connecting and communicating.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要連接和通訊之前指定本機 IP 位址和連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: If you create a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> using any other constructor, the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate local IP address and port number.
trans-unit.target: 如果您建立<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>使用任何其他建構函式，基礎的服務提供者會指派最適合的本機 IP 位址和連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: You must call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Connect%2A> method before sending and receiving data.
trans-unit.target: 您必須呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Connect%2A>方法，再傳送和接收資料。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create an instance of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> class using a local endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立執行個體<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>類別使用的本機端點。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="localEP" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="localEP" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Net.IPAddress.AddressFamily" /> of the IP protocol.
trans-unit.target: IP 通訊協定的 <see cref="P:System.Net.IPAddress.AddressFamily" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient" /> class with the specified family.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的家族，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create an instance of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立執行個體<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="family" /> parameter is not equal to AddressFamily.InterNetwork
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="family" /> 參數不等於 AddressFamily.InterNetwork

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="family" /> parameter is not equal to AddressFamily.InterNetworkV6
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="family" /> 參數不等於 AddressFamily.InterNetworkV6

trans-unit.source: The DNS name of the remote host to which you intend to connect.
trans-unit.target: 您要連接之遠端主機的 DNS 名稱。

trans-unit.source: The port number of the remote host to which you intend to connect.
trans-unit.target: 您要連接之遠端主機的連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient" /> class and connects to the specified port on the specified host.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient" /> 類別的新執行個體，並將它連接至指定主機的指定連接埠。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a new <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> and makes a synchronous connection attempt to the provided host name and port number.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立新<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>並使同步連線嘗試提供的主機名稱和連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: The underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate local IP address and port number.
trans-unit.target: 基礎服務提供者將會指派最適合的本機 IP 位址和連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> will block until it either connects or fails.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> 將會封鎖，直到連接或失敗為止。

trans-unit.source: This constructor allows you to initialize, resolve the DNS host name, and connect in one convenient step.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式可讓您來初始化、 解析的 DNS 主機名稱，以及連接在一個方便的步驟。

trans-unit.source: If IPv6 is enabled and the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29> method is called to connect to a host that resolves to both IPv6 and IPv4 addresses, the connection to the IPv6 address will be attempted first before the IPv4 address.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用 IPv6 和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29>呼叫方法來連線到主機解析為這兩個 IPv6 和 IPv4 位址，來嘗試連接到 IPv6 位址將會先的 IPv4 位址。

trans-unit.source: This may have the effect of delaying the time to establish the connection if the host is not listening on the IPv6 address.
trans-unit.target: 這可能會有延遲的時間來建立連接，如果主機並未接聽 IPv6 位址的效果。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>來取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, you can refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，您可以參考 Windows Sockets 第 2 版 API 錯誤的程式碼中的文件 MSDN 如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create an instance of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> class using a host name and port number.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立執行個體<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>類別使用主機名稱和連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="hostname" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="hostname" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="port" /> parameter is not between <see cref="F:System.Net.IPEndPoint.MinPort" /> and <see cref="F:System.Net.IPEndPoint.MaxPort" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="port" /> 參數不是介於 <see cref="F:System.Net.IPEndPoint.MinPort" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.Net.IPEndPoint.MaxPort" />。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing the socket.
trans-unit.target: 存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Gets or set a value that indicates whether a connection has been made.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否已建立連接。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the connection has been made; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已經建立連接，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> can use this property to determine if a connection attempt has succeeded.
trans-unit.target: 類別衍生自<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>可以使用這個屬性來判斷是否已成功連線嘗試。

trans-unit.source: It does not monitor the ongoing connection state of <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>.
trans-unit.target: 不會監視的進行中的連接狀態<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>。

trans-unit.source: If the remote host closes the connection, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Active%2A> will not be updated.
trans-unit.target: 如果遠端主機關閉的連接，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Active%2A>將不會更新。

trans-unit.source: If you are deriving from <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> and require closer attention to the connection state, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connected%2A> property of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> returned by the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Client%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您衍生自<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>，需要注意的連接狀態，而使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connected%2A>屬性<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>傳回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Client%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the amount of data that has been received from the network and is available to be read.
trans-unit.target: 取得已從網路接收且可供讀取的資料量。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes of data received from the network and available to be read.
trans-unit.target: 從網路收到的和可供讀取的資料位元組數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Available%2A> is a way to determine whether data is queued for reading.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Available%2A> 是一個方式來判斷資料是否會排入佇列進行讀取。

trans-unit.source: If data is available, call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A> to get the data.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料是提供，呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A>取得的資料。

trans-unit.source: The available data is the total amount of data queued in the network buffer for reading.
trans-unit.target: 可用的資料時的資料總量排入佇列進行讀取的網路緩衝區中。

trans-unit.source: If no data is queued in the network buffer, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Available%2A> returns 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有資料會排入佇列中的網路緩衝區，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Available%2A>傳回 0。

trans-unit.source: If the remote host shuts down or closes the connection, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Available%2A> may throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果遠端主機關機或關閉連接，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Available%2A>可能會擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>來取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, you can refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library) for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得此程式碼之後，您可以參閱 Windows Sockets 第 2 版 API 錯誤程式碼中的文件位於 MSDN library [ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Available%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Available%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous request for a remote host connection.
trans-unit.target: 開始遠端主機連接的非同步要求。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" /> of the remote host.
trans-unit.target: 遠端主機的 <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" />。

trans-unit.source: The port number of the remote host.
trans-unit.target: 遠端主機的連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate that references the method to invoke when the operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> 委派，會於作業完成時參考要叫用的方法。

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object that contains information about the connect operation.
trans-unit.target: 包含連線作業資訊的使用者定義物件。

trans-unit.source: This object is passed to the <c>requestCallback</c> delegate when the operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 作業完成時，這個物件會傳遞給 <c>requestCallback</c> 委派。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous request for a remote host connection.
trans-unit.target: 開始遠端主機連接的非同步要求。

trans-unit.source: The remote host is specified by an <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" /> and a port number (<see cref="T:System.Int32" />).
trans-unit.target: 遠端主機是由 <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" /> 和連接埠號碼 (<see cref="T:System.Int32" />) 指定。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object that references the asynchronous connection.
trans-unit.target: 參考非同步連接的 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.BeginConnect%2A> operation must be completed by calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.EndConnect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 非同步<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.BeginConnect%2A>作業必須完成呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.EndConnect%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the method is invoked by the `asyncCallback` delegate.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，方法由叫用`asyncCallback`委派。

trans-unit.source: This method does not block until the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會封鎖直到作業完成為止。

trans-unit.source: To block until the operation completes, use one of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Connect%2A> method overloads.
trans-unit.target: 若要封鎖直到作業完成為止，使用其中一種<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Connect%2A>方法多載。

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需使用非同步程式設計模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[呼叫同步方法以非同步方式](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> and connects to a remote host.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>並連接至遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="address" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="address" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: A caller higher in the call stack does not have permission for the requested operation.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫堆疊中位置較高的呼叫端對於要求的作業沒有權限。

trans-unit.source: The port number is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 連接埠號碼無效。

trans-unit.source: At least one <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" /> that designates the remote hosts.
trans-unit.target: 至少一個指定遠端主機的 <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" />。

trans-unit.source: The port number of the remote hosts.
trans-unit.target: 遠端主機的連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate that references the method to invoke when the operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> 委派，會於作業完成時參考要叫用的方法。

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object that contains information about the connect operation.
trans-unit.target: 包含連線作業資訊的使用者定義物件。

trans-unit.source: This object is passed to the <c>requestCallback</c> delegate when the operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 作業完成時，這個物件會傳遞給 <c>requestCallback</c> 委派。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous request for a remote host connection.
trans-unit.target: 開始遠端主機連接的非同步要求。

trans-unit.source: The remote host is specified by an <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" /> array and a port number (<see cref="T:System.Int32" />).
trans-unit.target: 遠端主機是由 <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" /> 陣列和連接埠號碼 (<see cref="T:System.Int32" />) 指定。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object that references the asynchronous connection.
trans-unit.target: 參考非同步連接的 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.BeginConnect%2A> operation must be completed by calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.EndConnect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 非同步<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.BeginConnect%2A>作業必須完成呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.EndConnect%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the method is invoked by the `asyncCallback` delegate.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，方法由叫用`asyncCallback`委派。

trans-unit.source: This method does not block until the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會封鎖直到作業完成為止。

trans-unit.source: To block until the operation completes, use one of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Connect%2A> method overloads.
trans-unit.target: 若要封鎖直到作業完成為止，使用其中一種<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Connect%2A>方法多載。

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需使用非同步程式設計模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[呼叫同步方法以非同步方式](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。

trans-unit.source: This method is typically used immediately after a call to the <xref:System.Net.Dns.BeginGetHostAddresses%2A> method, which can return multiple IP addresses for a single host.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法通常用來呼叫之後立即<xref:System.Net.Dns.BeginGetHostAddresses%2A>方法，可傳回多個 IP 位址的單一主機。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> and connects to a remote host.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>並連接至遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="host" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="host" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: A caller higher in the call stack does not have permission for the requested operation.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫堆疊中位置較高的呼叫端對於要求的作業沒有權限。

trans-unit.source: The port number is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 連接埠號碼無效。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the underlying <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定基礎 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />。

trans-unit.source: The underlying network <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />.
trans-unit.target: 基礎網路 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> creates a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> to send and receive data over a network.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> 建立<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>來傳送和接收資料透過網路。

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> can use this property to get or set this <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: 類別衍生自<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>可以使用這個屬性來取得或設定此<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>。

trans-unit.source: Use the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> returned from <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Client%2A> if you require access beyond that which <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> provides.
trans-unit.target: 使用基礎<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>從傳回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Client%2A>如果您需要存取超過其<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>提供。

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Client%2A> to set the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> to an existing <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Client%2A>設基礎<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>至現有<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>。

trans-unit.source: This might be useful if you want to take advantage of the simplicity of <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> using a pre-existing <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: 這可能是很有用，如果您想要充分利用的簡易性<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>使用預先存在<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Client%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Client%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the receive buffer size of the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> is changed.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，接收緩衝區的大小基礎<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>變更。

trans-unit.source: Disposes this <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient" /> instance and requests that the underlying TCP connection be closed.
trans-unit.target: 處置此 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient" /> 執行個體，並要求關閉基礎 TCP 連接。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Close%2A> method marks the instance as disposed and requests that the associated <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> close the TCP connection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Close%2A>方法標示為已處置的執行個體與要求相關聯<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>關閉 TCP 連線。

trans-unit.source: Based on the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.LingerState%2A> property, the TCP connection may stay open for some time after the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Close%2A> method is called when data remains to be sent.
trans-unit.target: 根據<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.LingerState%2A>屬性，TCP 連線可能會維持開啟後一些時間<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Close%2A>呼叫方法時，要傳送的資料會保留。

trans-unit.source: There is no notification provided when the underlying connection has completed closing.
trans-unit.target: 不沒有提供 「 基礎連接完成後關閉任何通知。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method will eventually result in the close of the associated <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> and will also close the associated <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> that is used to send and receive data if one was created.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法最終會導致相關聯的關閉<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>和也會關閉相關聯<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>用來傳送和接收資料，如果建立一個。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates closing a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> by calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Close%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何關閉<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>藉由呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Close%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Connects the client to a remote TCP host using the specified host name and port number.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的主機名稱和連接埠號碼將用戶端連接至遠端 TCP 主機。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.IPEndPoint" /> to which you intend to connect.
trans-unit.target: 您要連接的 <see cref="T:System.Net.IPEndPoint" />。

trans-unit.source: Connects the client to a remote TCP host using the specified remote network endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的遠端網路端點將用戶端連接至遠端 TCP 主機。

trans-unit.source: Call this method to establish a synchronous remote host connection to the specified <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法來建立指定的同步遠端主機連接<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>。

trans-unit.source: Before you call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Connect%2A> you must create an instance of the <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> class using an IP address and a port number.
trans-unit.target: 之前先呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Connect%2A>您必須建立的執行個體<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>類別使用的 IP 位址和連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: Use this <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> as the `remoteEP` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 使用此<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>為`remoteEP`參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Connect%2A> method will block until it either connects or fails.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Connect%2A>方法將會封鎖，直到連接或失敗為止。

trans-unit.source: After connecting with the remote host, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.GetStream%2A> method to obtain the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>.
trans-unit.target: 連接的遠端主機之後, 使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.GetStream%2A>方法，以取得基礎<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>。

trans-unit.source: Use this <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> to send and receive data.
trans-unit.target: 使用此<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>來傳送和接收資料。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>來取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, you can refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，您可以參考 Windows Sockets 第 2 版 API 錯誤的程式碼中的文件 MSDN 如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: This method is typically used immediately after a call to the <xref:System.Net.Dns.BeginGetHostAddresses%2A> method, which can return multiple IP addresses for a single host.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法通常用來呼叫之後立即<xref:System.Net.Dns.BeginGetHostAddresses%2A>方法，可傳回多個 IP 位址的單一主機。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Connect%2A> method to establish a synchronous remote host connection to the host specified by the array of <xref:System.Net.IPAddress> elements and the port number.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Connect%2A>方法，以建立同步的遠端主機連接到指定的陣列的主機<xref:System.Net.IPAddress>項目和連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Connect%2A> method will block until it either connects or fails.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Connect%2A>方法將會封鎖，直到連接或失敗為止。

trans-unit.source: After connecting with the remote host, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.GetStream%2A> method to obtain the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>.
trans-unit.target: 連接的遠端主機之後, 使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.GetStream%2A>方法，以取得基礎<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>。

trans-unit.source: Use this <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> to send and receive data.
trans-unit.target: 使用此<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>來傳送和接收資料。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>來取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, you can refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library) for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得此程式碼之後，您可以參閱 Windows Sockets 第 2 版 API 錯誤程式碼中的文件位於 MSDN library [ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses an IP Address and port number to connect with a remote host.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會使用與遠端主機連接的 IP 位址和連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="ipAddresses" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="ipAddresses" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The port number is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 連接埠號碼無效。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: A caller higher in the call stack does not have permission for the requested operation.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫堆疊中位置較高的呼叫端對於要求的作業沒有權限。

trans-unit.source: This method is valid for sockets that use the <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetwork" /> flag or the <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetworkV6" /> flag.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法對使用 <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetwork" /> 旗標或 <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetworkV6" /> 旗標的通訊端有效。

trans-unit.source: The DNS name of the remote host to which you intend to connect.
trans-unit.target: 您要連接之遠端主機的 DNS 名稱。

trans-unit.source: The port number of the remote host to which you intend to connect.
trans-unit.target: 您要連接之遠端主機的連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: Connects the client to the specified port on the specified host.
trans-unit.target: 將用戶端連接到所指定主機上的指定連接埠。

trans-unit.source: Call this method to establish a synchronous remote host connection to the specified host name and port number.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法來建立同步的遠端主機連線到指定的主機名稱和連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Connect%2A> method will block until it either connects or fails.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Connect%2A>方法將會封鎖，直到連接或失敗為止。

trans-unit.source: After connecting with the remote host, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.GetStream%2A> method to obtain the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>.
trans-unit.target: 連接的遠端主機之後, 使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.GetStream%2A>方法，以取得基礎<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>。

trans-unit.source: Use this <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> to send and receive data.
trans-unit.target: 使用此<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>來傳送和接收資料。

trans-unit.source: If IPv6 is enabled and the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Connect%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29> method is called to connect to a host that resolves to both IPv6 and IPv4 addresses, the connection to the IPv6 address will be attempted first before the IPv4 address.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用 IPv6 和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Connect%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29>呼叫方法來連線到主機解析為這兩個 IPv6 和 IPv4 位址，來嘗試連接到 IPv6 位址將會先的 IPv4 位址。

trans-unit.source: This may have the effect of delaying the time to establish the connection if the host is not listening on the IPv6 address.
trans-unit.target: 這可能會有延遲的時間來建立連接，如果主機並未接聽 IPv6 位址的效果。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>來取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, you can refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，您可以參考 Windows Sockets 第 2 版 API 錯誤的程式碼中的文件 MSDN 如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient" /> is closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the underlying <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> for a <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient" /> is connected to a remote host.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient" /> 的基礎 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 是否已連接至遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Client" /> socket was connected to a remote resource as of the most recent operation; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果最近一次的作業是將 <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Client" /> 通訊端連接至遠端資源，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Connected%2A> property gets the connection state of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Client%2A> socket as of the last I/O operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Connected%2A>屬性取得的連接狀態<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Client%2A>最後一次的 I/O 作業的通訊端。

trans-unit.source: When it returns `false`, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Client%2A> socket was either never connected, or is no longer connected.
trans-unit.target: 當它傳回`false`、<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Client%2A>通訊端可能永遠不會連線，或已中斷連線。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Connected%2A> property only reflects the state of the connection as of the most recent operation, you should attempt to send or receive a message to determine the current state.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Connected%2A>屬性只會反映最新的作業連接的狀態，您應該嘗試傳送或接收訊息來判斷目前的狀態。

trans-unit.source: After the message send fails, this property no longer returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性將訊息傳送失敗之後，不會再傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: Note that this behavior is by design.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，此行為是經過設計。

trans-unit.source: You cannot reliably test the state of the connection because, in the time between the test and a send/receive, the connection could have been lost.
trans-unit.target: 您無法可靠地測試連接的狀態，因為測試與傳送/接收之間的時間，連線可能已遺失。

trans-unit.source: Your code should assume the socket is connected, and gracefully handle failed transmissions.
trans-unit.target: 通訊端連線，並依正常程序處理傳輸失敗的應該假設您的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The following code example connects to a remote endpoint and then verifies the connection.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會連接到遠端端點，然後驗證該連接。

trans-unit.source: Releases the managed and unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient" />.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient" /> 使用的 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Set to <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 設定為 <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，設定為 <see langword="false" /> 表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient" /> 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes this method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` 這個方法會叫用`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes this method with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 這個方法會叫用`disposing`設`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> references.
trans-unit.target: `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。

trans-unit.source: It does this by invoking the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 其做法是叫用`Dispose()`每個參考物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫 <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> 時，請小心不要參考到先前已在對 <see langword="Dispose" /> 的早期呼叫中被處置 (Dispose) 的物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何實作<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object returned by a call to <see cref="Overload:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.BeginConnect" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 物件，由對 <see cref="Overload:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.BeginConnect" /> 的呼叫傳回。

trans-unit.source: Ends a pending asynchronous connection attempt.
trans-unit.target: 結束擱置的非同步連接嘗試。

trans-unit.source: This method blocks until the operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會封鎖直到作業完成。

trans-unit.source: To perform this operation synchronously, use a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Connect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要以同步方式執行這項作業，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Connect%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>來取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, you can refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library) for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得此程式碼之後，您可以參閱 Windows Sockets 第 2 版 API 錯誤程式碼中的文件位於 MSDN library [ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: The following code example ends the asynchronous connection attempt.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會結束非同步的連接嘗試。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="asyncResult" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="asyncResult" /> parameter was not returned by a call to a <see cref="Overload:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.BeginConnect" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 對 <see cref="Overload:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.BeginConnect" /> 方法的呼叫未傳回<paramref name="asyncResult" /> 參數。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.EndConnect(System.IAsyncResult)" /> method was previously called for the asynchronous connection.
trans-unit.target: 先前已呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.EndConnect(System.IAsyncResult)" /> 方法進行非同步連接。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The underlying <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: 基礎 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient" /> allows only one client to use a port.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，指定 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient" /> 是否只允許一個用戶端使用連接埠。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient" /> allows only one client to use a specific port; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient" /> 只允許一個用戶端使用特定通訊埠則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" /> for Windows Server 2003 and Windows XP Service Pack 2 and later, and <see langword="false" /> for all other versions.
trans-unit.target: 若為 Windows Server 2003 和 Windows XP Service Pack 2 (含) 以後版本，則預設值為 <see langword="true" />；若為所有其他版本，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: By default, multiple clients can use a specific port; however, only one of the clients can perform operations on the network traffic sent to the port.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，多個用戶端可以使用特定通訊埠。不過，只有其中一個用戶端可以執行網路流量傳送至連接埠的作業。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.ExclusiveAddressUse%2A> property to prevent multiple clients from using a specific port.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.ExclusiveAddressUse%2A>防止多個用戶端使用特定通訊埠的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property must be set before the underlying socket is bound to a client port.
trans-unit.target: 基礎通訊端的用戶端連接埠繫結之前，必須設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Connect%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.BeginConnect%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.%23ctor%28System.Net.IPEndPoint%29>, or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29>, the client port is bound as a side effect of the method, and you cannot subsequently set the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.ExclusiveAddressUse%2A> property
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Connect%2A>， <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.BeginConnect%2A>， <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.%23ctor%28System.Net.IPEndPoint%29>，或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29>用戶端連接埠會繫結為之方法的副作用，您之後無法設定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.ExclusiveAddressUse%2A>屬性

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> and gets and sets the value of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.ExclusiveAddressUse%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>取得和設定的值<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.ExclusiveAddressUse%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the underlying socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取基礎通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The underlying <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: 基礎 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: Frees resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient" /> 類別所使用的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法覆寫 <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Application code should not call this method; an object's <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式程式碼不應該呼叫這個方法。物件的<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法會自動叫用記憶體回收期間，除非已停用記憶體回收行程的最終處理的呼叫所<xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> class finalizer closes the TCP connection and releases all managed resources associated with the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>類別完成項關閉 TCP 連接，並與相關聯的 managed 的資源全部釋出<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>。

trans-unit.source: These resources include the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> used for connecting with the remote host, and the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> used to send and receive data.
trans-unit.target: 這些資源包含基礎<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>用來連線的遠端主機，而<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>用來傳送和接收資料。

trans-unit.source: The finalizer does not release any unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 完成項不會釋放任何 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Finalize 方法和解構函式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70)，[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)，和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream" /> used to send and receive data.
trans-unit.target: 傳回用來傳送和接收資料的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream" />。

trans-unit.source: The underlying <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream" />.
trans-unit.target: 基礎 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.GetStream%2A> returns a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> that you can use to send and receive data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.GetStream%2A> 傳回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>可用來傳送和接收資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> class inherits from the <xref:System.IO.Stream> class, which provides a rich collection of methods and properties used to facilitate network communications.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>類別繼承自<xref:System.IO.Stream>類別，可提供豐富的方法和屬性可用來協助進行網路通訊的集合。

trans-unit.source: You must call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Connect%2A> method first, or the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.GetStream%2A> method will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 您必須呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Connect%2A>方法第一次，或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.GetStream%2A>方法會擲回<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>, call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A> method to send data to the remote host.
trans-unit.target: 取得後<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>，呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A>將資料傳送至遠端主機的方法。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A> method to receive data arriving from the remote host.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A>方法，以接收來自遠端主機抵達的資料。

trans-unit.source: Both of these methods block until the specified operation is performed.
trans-unit.target: 這兩種方法阻擋，直到指定的作業會執行。

trans-unit.source: You can avoid blocking on a read operation by checking the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.DataAvailable%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以避免在讀取作業封鎖藉由檢查<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.DataAvailable%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: A `true` value means that data has arrived from the remote host and is available for reading.
trans-unit.target: A`true`值表示資料來自遠端主機已送達，而且可供讀取。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A> is guaranteed to complete immediately.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A>保證立即完成。

trans-unit.source: If the remote host has shutdown its connection, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A> will immediately return with zero bytes.
trans-unit.target: 如果遠端主機已關閉連線，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A>便會立即傳回零個位元組。

trans-unit.source: You must close the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> when you are through sending and receiving data.
trans-unit.target: 您必須先關閉<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>當您已透過傳送和接收資料。

trans-unit.source: Closing <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> does not release the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>.
trans-unit.target: 關閉<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>不會釋放<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>來取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, you can refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，您可以參考 Windows Sockets 第 2 版 API 錯誤的程式碼中的文件 MSDN 如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.GetStream%2A> to obtain the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.GetStream%2A>取得基礎<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>。

trans-unit.source: After obtaining the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>, it sends and receives using its <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 取得之後<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>，傳送及接收使用其<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient" /> is not connected to a remote host.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient" /> 未連接至遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets information about the linger state of the associated socket.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定關聯通訊端延遲狀態的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption" />。

trans-unit.source: By default, lingering is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，會停用延遲。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.LingerState%2A> property changes the way <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A> method behaves.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.LingerState%2A>屬性變更的方式<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A>方法的行為。

trans-unit.source: This property when set modifies the conditions under which the connection can be reset by Winsock.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性集修改的條件的連線可以來重設 Winsock 時。

trans-unit.source: Connection resets can still occur based on the IP protocol behavior.
trans-unit.target: 連接重設仍可能是根據 IP 通訊協定行為。

trans-unit.source: This property controls the length of time that the TCP connection will remain open after a call to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Close%2A> when data remains to be sent.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會控制的呼叫之後，TCP 連接將維持開啟的時間長度<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Close%2A>時仍可傳送資料。

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A> method, data is placed in the outgoing network buffer.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A>方法時，資料會在傳出的網路緩衝區中。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to ensure that this data is sent to the remote host before the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Close%2A> method drops the connection.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可以用來確保這些資料會傳送至遠端主機之前<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Close%2A>方法會卸除連接。

trans-unit.source: To enable lingering, create a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption> instance containing the desired values, and set the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.LingerState%2A> property to this instance.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用延遲，請建立<xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption>執行個體包含所需的值，並設定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.LingerState%2A>屬性與這個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the behavior of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Close%2A> method for the possible values of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption.Enabled%2A> property and the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption.LingerTime%2A> property stored in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.LingerState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述的行為<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Close%2A>的可能值的方法<xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption.Enabled%2A>屬性和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption.LingerTime%2A>屬性儲存在<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.LingerState%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: LingerState.Enabled
trans-unit.target: LingerState.Enabled

trans-unit.source: LingerState.LingerTime
trans-unit.target: LingerState.LingerTime

trans-unit.source: Behavior
trans-unit.target: 行為

trans-unit.source: `false` (disabled), the default value
trans-unit.target: `false` （已停用），預設值

trans-unit.source: The time-out is not applicable, (default).
trans-unit.target: 不適用，在逾時 （預設值）。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to send pending data until the default IP protocol time-out expires.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將預設 IP 通訊協定等候逾時到期之前傳送暫止的資料。

trans-unit.source: `true` (enabled)
trans-unit.target: `true` （已啟用）

trans-unit.source: A nonzero time-out
trans-unit.target: 非零的逾時

trans-unit.source: Attempts to send pending data until the specified time-out expires, and if the attempt fails, then Winsock resets the connection.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試傳送暫止資料，直到指定的逾時到期，而如果嘗試失敗，則 Winsock 重設連接。

trans-unit.source: `true` (enabled)
trans-unit.target: `true` （已啟用）

trans-unit.source: A zero timeout.
trans-unit.target: 零逾時。

trans-unit.source: Discards any pending data and Winsock resets the connection.
trans-unit.target: 會捨棄任何暫止的資料和 Winsock 重設連接。

trans-unit.source: The IP stack computes the default IP protocol time-out period to use based on the round trip time of the connection.
trans-unit.target: IP 堆疊計算預設 IP 通訊協定逾時期間，若要使用的連線的來回時間為基礎。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, the time-out computed by the stack is more relevant than one defined by an application.
trans-unit.target: 在大部分情況下，堆疊計算的逾時值為更有相關性比其中一個應用程式所定義的。

trans-unit.source: This is the default behavior for a socket when the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.LingerState%2A> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 這是預設行為是通訊端時<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.LingerState%2A>屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption.LingerTime%2A> property stored in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.LingerState%2A> property is set greater than the default IP protocol time-out, the default IP protocol time-out will still apply and override.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption.LingerTime%2A>屬性儲存在<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.LingerState%2A>屬性設定大於預設 IP 通訊協定等候逾時，仍將套用的預設 IP 通訊協定逾時，覆寫。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets and gets the sockets linger time.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會設定並取得通訊端的延遲時間。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that disables a delay when send or receive buffers are not full.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，在傳送或接收緩衝區未滿時停用延遲。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the delay is disabled, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果停用延遲，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.NoDelay%2A> is `false`, a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> does not send a packet over the network until it has collected a significant amount of outgoing data.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.NoDelay%2A>是`false`、<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>不會傳送封包透過網路直到它已經收集大量的連出的資料。

trans-unit.source: Because of the amount of overhead in a TCP segment, sending small amounts of data is inefficient.
trans-unit.target: 大量的 TCP 區段中的額外負荷，傳送小量的資料沒有效率。

trans-unit.source: However, situations do exist where you need to send very small amounts of data or expect immediate responses from each packet you send.
trans-unit.target: 不過，還存在的情況下，您要傳送非常少量的資料或預期從您傳送的每個封包的立即回應。

trans-unit.source: Your decision should weigh the relative importance of network efficiency versus application requirements.
trans-unit.target: 您應該衡量網路效率和應用程式需求的相對重要性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example disables the delay.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會停用延遲。

trans-unit.source: It then checks the value of <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.NoDelay%2A> to verify that the property was successfully set.
trans-unit.target: 接著它會檢查值<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.NoDelay%2A>若要確認已成功設定的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the receive buffer.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定接收緩衝區的大小。

trans-unit.source: The size of the receive buffer, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 接收緩衝區的大小，以位元組為單位。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 8192 bytes.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 8192 位元組。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.ReceiveBufferSize%2A> property gets or sets the number of bytes that you are expecting to store in the receive buffer for each read operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.ReceiveBufferSize%2A>屬性取得或設定您預期會針對每個讀取作業，接收緩衝區中儲存的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: This property actually manipulates the network buffer space allocated for receiving incoming data.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性實際上則會配置用來接收內送資料的網路緩衝區空間操作。

trans-unit.source: Your network buffer should be at least as large as your application buffer to ensure that the desired data will be available when you call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 您的網路緩衝區應該要有至少以確保，當您呼叫的所需的資料都是可用的應用程式緩衝區一樣大<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.ReceiveBufferSize%2A> property to set this size.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.ReceiveBufferSize%2A>屬性來設定此大小。

trans-unit.source: If your application will be receiving bulk data, you should pass the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A> method a very large application buffer.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式將會收到大量資料，您應該將<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A>方法非常大的應用程式緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: If the network buffer is smaller than the amount of data you request in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A> method, you will not be able to retrieve the desired amount of data in one read operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果網路緩衝區的資料量小於您要求中<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A>方法，將無法擷取所需的一個讀取作業中的資料數量。

trans-unit.source: This incurs the overhead of additional calls to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這樣會導致其他呼叫的額外負荷<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets and gets the receive buffer size.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會設定，並取得接收緩衝區的大小。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when setting the buffer size.
trans-unit.target: 設定緩衝區大小時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: -or-
In .NET Compact Framework applications, you cannot set this property.
trans-unit.target: 在 .NET Compact Framework 應用程式中，您無法設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: For a workaround, see the Platform Note in Remarks.
trans-unit.target: 如需解決方法，請參閱＜註解＞中的＜平台注意事項＞。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of time a <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient" /> will wait to receive data once a read operation is initiated.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定時間值，<see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient" /> 一旦啟始讀取作業後，將據此等待以接收資料。

trans-unit.source: The time-out value of the connection in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 連接的逾時值，以毫秒為單位。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.ReceiveTimeout%2A> property determines the amount of time that the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A> method will block until it is able to receive data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.ReceiveTimeout%2A>屬性決定的時間量，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A>方法將會封鎖，直到它能接收資料。

trans-unit.source: This time is measured in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 此時間的測量以毫秒為單位。

trans-unit.source: If the time-out expires before <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A> successfully completes, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> throws a <xref:System.IO.IOException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果在逾時到期前<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A>成功完成，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>會擲回<xref:System.IO.IOException>。

trans-unit.source: There is no time-out by default.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設沒有逾時。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets and gets the receive time out.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會設定並取得接收逾時。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the send buffer.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定傳送緩衝區的大小。

trans-unit.source: The size of the send buffer, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 傳送緩衝區的大小，以位元組為單位。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 8192 bytes.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 8192 位元組。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.SendBufferSize%2A> property gets or sets the number of bytes that you are expecting to send in each call to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.SendBufferSize%2A>屬性取得或設定您預期會在每次呼叫中傳送的位元組數目<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: This property actually manipulates the network buffer space allocated for send operation.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性實際操作配置來傳送作業的網路緩衝區空間。

trans-unit.source: Your network buffer should be at least as large as your application buffer to ensure that the desired data will be stored and sent in one operation.
trans-unit.target: 您的網路緩衝區應該至少與您的應用程式緩衝區，以確保所需的資料會儲存並傳送一個作業中一樣大。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.SendBufferSize%2A> property to set this size.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.SendBufferSize%2A>屬性來設定此大小。

trans-unit.source: If your application will be sending bulk data, you should pass the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A> method a very large application buffer.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式將用來傳送大量資料，您應該將<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A>方法非常大的應用程式緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: If the network buffer is smaller than the amount of data you provide the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A> method, several network send operations will be performed for every call you make to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果網路緩衝區的資料量小於提供<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A>數個網路的傳送您對每個呼叫將會執行作業的方法，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can achieve greater data throughput by ensuring that your network buffer is at least as large as your application buffer.
trans-unit.target: 您可以達到較大的資料輸送量，方法是確保您的網路緩衝區為至少和應用程式緩衝區一樣大。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets and gets the send buffer size.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會設定，並取得傳送緩衝區大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of time a <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient" /> will wait for a send operation to complete successfully.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定時間值，<see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient" /> 將據此等候傳送作業成功完成。

trans-unit.source: The send time-out value, in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 傳送的逾時值，以毫秒為單位。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.SendTimeout%2A> property determines the amount of time that the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Send%2A> method will block until it is able to return successfully.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.SendTimeout%2A>屬性決定的時間量，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Send%2A>方法將會封鎖，直到它能成功地傳回。

trans-unit.source: This time is measured in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 此時間的測量以毫秒為單位。

trans-unit.source: After you call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A> method, the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> returns the number of bytes actually sent to the host.
trans-unit.target: 在您呼叫後<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Write%2A>方法時，基礎<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>傳回實際傳送至主機的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.SendTimeout%2A> property determines the amount of time a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> will wait before receiving the number of bytes returned.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.SendTimeout%2A>屬性決定的時間量<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>接收的位元組數傳回之前會先等待。

trans-unit.source: If the time-out expires before the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Send%2A> method successfully completes, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> will throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果在逾時到期前<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Send%2A>方法已成功完成，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>將會擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>。

trans-unit.source: There is no time-out by default.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設沒有逾時。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets and gets the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.SendTimeout%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會設定並取得<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.SendTimeout%2A>值。
